subject: Re: Thank you for your recent application, we are ready to give a loan
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply need to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$224,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this easy form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://erntlimb.com/
